      • updateTagName

        void updateTagName​(java.lang.String s1,
                   java.lang.String s2)
            throws pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.TagException,
                   pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.TagNotFoundException
        Update exists tag by changing it name.
        Parameters:
        s1 - Specified old Tag name.
        s2 - Specified new Tag name.
        Throws:
        pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.TagException - when Tag name didn't match pattern.
        pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.TagNotFoundException - when Tag is not present in database.
